subject: Greetings !
body:
Greetings !
I am Mr. Ammar Hussain from Qatar Petroleum.
I have one hundred million dollars for Investment. Contact me if you are interested. I have all what it will take to move the fund to you as a contract fund to avoid every query; more details upon the receipt of your response.
Regards,
Ammar Hussain.
Qatar Petroleum.
Finance and Accountant.
Email: 
ammarhussain100@yahoo.com

subject: Re: Greetings !
body:
Hello Mr. Ammar Hussain,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I'm intrigued by your offer of one hundred million dollars. Can you please provide me with more information about the contract fund and how it would be moved to me? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding of the process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Christian
